A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: certainly not like i expected\, and not a perfect movie by any means.. but\, despite many things going completely differently than I had initially hoped\, i cant deny that i left the theater very pleased. it was a great act 2 for a trilogy\, and i was blown away by some of the cinematography and visuals. if i remove my own pre-conceived biases\, it was just a great movie to watch and really a new look at Star Wars.. and thats what many Gen X'ers also fail to realize\, this movie is largely for a whole new generation of fans.. bot just for old dudes like myself. and i think they succeeded in breaking new ground and setting up a completely unknown final act. i cant wait to see ep. 9.
